projects.title: Course Look Up App
projects.author: Jay M Gonzalez
projects.description: This app displays all the courses that I have completed recently. Within the app you can CRUD the courses that will affect the BD temporarily. It uses a json-server backend deployed in Heroku that will relaod every so often to the original data deployed.

projects.title: Containerize a React App
projects.author: Jay M Gonzalez
projects.description: I created this project to go with the article I wrote about 'How to Containerize a React App with docker-compose' and let people use the files in the project or use them as a boiler plate to create their next app with React and Docker.

projects.title: Image Search App with Tailwind
projects.author: Jay M Gonzalez
projects.description: Image search App that get information from pixabay API with a searching box that looks for keywords against tags at the main site where all the pictures are stored. The CSS framework used on this project is Tailwind.

projects.title: Instagram like App with Firebase
projects.author: Jay M Gonzalez
projects.description: App similar to Instagram that I created with a Firebase backend where you can updaload your pictures. At the moment its open for everyone to try so if you go in you could upload any picture and it will get save for the next visits.

projects.title: Backend for courses look up app
projects.author: Jay M Gonzalez
projects.description: Backend to add information and functionality to the courses look up app where I deployed the DB in Heroku with the package json-server, this module is usually utilize to mock API behaviour but it can be deployed as proven in this project.

projects.title: Downtown Website
projects.author: Jay M Gonzalez
projects.description: Website for a creative agency in Madrid

projects.title: Pokemon Memory Game
projects.author: Jay M Gonzalez
projects.description: Little memory game I created resembling Pokemon balls.

projects.title: LinkedIn Bot
projects.author: Jay M Gonzalez
projects.description: Project where I developed a script to make automatic connection request and write a message like a human would do to make it less detectable for anti bots on the linkedIn search connection page

projects.title: Landing page for QR menu
projects.author: Jay M Gonzalez
projects.description: Landing page created to test the viability of a business idea. Create menus for restaurants and accept payments to reduce human interaction during covid pandemic
